27.eng-name: Chapters on Righteousness And Maintaining Good Relations With Relatives
27.ara-name: كتاب البر والصلة عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Al-Bara bin Azib narrated that the Messenger of Allah said :"Whoever gives someone some milk or silver, or guides him through a strait, then he will have the reward similar to freeing a slave

chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Minhah (Giving A Gift)
